about_the_game:
• Ability to choose Autumn course theme with its distinctive shades of color. Trees have autumn colored leaves with visible leaves falling in the wind, pond lillies loose their blooms and have a mix of yellow/golden color for some of the pads. This theme supports all existing levels.

  • 9 new levels playable in all modes and themes.

  • New rideable rails adding both some additional gameplay and decorative element to some levels.

  • Three halloween themed ball customizations including Mummy, Jack, and Ghost which are timed unlocks for playing around Halloween.
detailed_description:
• Ability to choose Autumn course theme with its distinctive shades of color. Trees have autumn colored leaves with visible leaves falling in the wind, pond lillies loose their blooms and have a mix of yellow/golden color for some of the pads. This theme supports all existing levels.

  • 9 new levels playable in all modes and themes.

  • New rideable rails adding both some additional gameplay and decorative element to some levels.

  • Three halloween themed ball customizations including Mummy, Jack, and Ghost which are timed unlocks for playing around Halloween.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® 700 Series (Maxwell) / AMD Radeon™ RX 400 Series / AMD Ryzen™ Processors with Radeon™ Vega Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Medium".
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Highest".

name: Golfing in Aether - Autumn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® 700 Series (Maxwell) / AMD Radeon™ RX 400 Series / AMD Ryzen™ Processors with Radeon™ Vega Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Medium".
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, 11 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon™ RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60fps when graphics settings are set to "Highest".

short_description: The first free expansion to Golfing in Aether, introducing autumn colors along with several new levels.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
